item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Christopher Moore
Tiffani add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "If you have come to these pages for laughter, may you find it. If you are here to be offended, may your ire rise and your blood boil. If you seek an adventure, may this song sing you away to blissful escape. If you need to test or confirm your beliefs, may you reach comfortable conclusions. All books reveal perfection, by what they are or what they are not. May you find that which you seek, in these pages or outside them. May you find perfection, and know it by name." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Sometimes you wake up. Sometimes the fall kills you. And sometimes, when you fall, you fly." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Life is a disease: sexually transmitted, and invariably fatal." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Most books on witchcraft will tell you that witches work naked. This is because most books on witchcraft were written by men." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "If you were me, then I'd be you, and if I were you, then I'd hide somewhere far away." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "HAPPINESS [is] ONLY REAL WHEN SHARED" -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Science and religion are not at odds. Science is simply too young to understand." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Mark Haddon
item.description: "Prime numbers are what is left when you have taken all the patterns away. I think prime numbers are like life. They are very logical but you could never work out the rules, even if you spent all your time thinking about them." -- Mark Haddon

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Mark Haddon
item.description: "All the other children at my school are stupid. Except I'm not meant to call them stupid, even though this is what they are." -- Mark Haddon

item.title: Tiffani add a quote by Georges Perec
item.description:
"What we need to question is bricks, concrete, glass, our table manners, our utensils, our tools, the way we spend our time, our rhythms. To question that which seems to have ceased forever to astonish us. We live, true, we breathe, true; we walk, we go downstairs, we sit at a table in order to eat, we lie down on a bed on order to sleep. How? Where? When? Why?
Describe your street. Describe another. Compare." -- Georges Perec
